weapons.name: Battle Wrench
weapons.description: Big wrench. Looks painful.

weapons.name: Big Bucks Hammer
weapons.description: Odd hammer that makes the user rich.

weapons.name: Cubic Hammer
weapons.description: Powerful. Sharp corners. Delivers heavy damage.

weapons.name: Digi Hammer
weapons.description: High-tech hammer designed for efficient attack.

weapons.name: Drill Wrench
weapons.description: Wrench with a drill attached.

weapons.name: Frozen Tuna
weapons.description: Frozen like a rock. You can't eat it. Use it as a weapon.

weapons.name: Grade Zero
weapons.description: Rolls attack points all the way around to zero again.

weapons.name: Heavy Hammer
weapons.description: Battle hammer that packs a heavy wallop.

weapons.name: Kubera's Hand
weapons.description: Hammer in the shape of the god Kubera's hand.

weapons.name: LEGEND
weapons.description: Legendary hammer whose very existence was in doubt.

weapons.name: Poison Wrench
weapons.description: Wrench that can sting the enemy with poison.

weapons.name: Smash Wrench
weapons.description: Powerful wrench that smashes monsters to pieces.

weapons.name: Sigma Breaker
weapons.description: Highly functional weapon that splits the damage.

weapons.name: Stinger Wrench
weapons.description: Special wrench that can steal items from the enemy.

weapons.name: True Battle Wrench
weapons.description: The Battle Wrench, made easier to use in battle.

weapons.name: Turtle Shell Hammer
weapons.description: Hammer made from a turtle's shell.

weapons.name: Bell Trigger
weapons.description: Chaming gun made from a bell. Kind of cute, really.

weapons.name: Classic Gun
weapons.description: Light and easy to use.

weapons.name: Dark Viper
weapons.description: Sucks up and absorbs the effect of enemy attack.

weapons.name: Desperado
weapons.description: Vindictive machine gun bent on revenge.

weapons.name: Dryer Gun
weapons.description: Peculiar gun fashioned out of a hair dryer.

weapons.name: Grenade Launcher
weapons.description: Allows rapid fire of grenades. A little heavy.

weapons.name: Jurak Gun
weapons.description: Jurak's mystical gun. It's powerful, but a bit plain.

weapons.name: Last Resort
weapons.description: There's no tomorrow for whoever faces this one.

weapons.name: Magic Gun
weapons.description: Forms magic power in the atmosphere into bullets.

weapons.name: Question Shooter
weapons.description: Interrogates the enemy.

weapons.name: Sexy Panther
weapons.description: A sexy little number. Can't get enough of this one.

weapons.name: Sigma Bazooka
weapons.description: Bazooka that fires rocket bombs.

weapons.name: Soul Breaker
weapons.description: Legend says it can smash any living creature's soul.

weapons.name: Star Breaker
weapons.description: Its trademark is the destroyed star on its side.

weapons.name: Steal Gun
weapons.description: Steals enemy's items. Also called the "Thief Gun".

weapons.name: Supernova
weapons.description: Laser gun that burns as brightly as exploding stars.

weapons.name: Trumpet Gun
weapons.description: Gun made from a trumpet. What'll they think of next?

weapons.name: Twin Buster
weapons.description: A double-barreled gun. Twice the power?

weapons.name: Wild Cat
weapons.description: Cursed machine gun. Brings out the beast in its user.

weapons.name: Albatross
weapons.description: Spheda club. Good for long and curved shots.

weapons.name: Falcon
weapons.description: Spheda club. Good for long shots.

weapons.name: Flamingo
weapons.description: Spheda club. Good for medium range and curved shots.

weapons.name: Handy Stick
weapons.description: Just the right size for swinging. Good for Spheda?

weapons.name: Swan
weapons.description: Spheda club. Good for medium range shots.

weapons.name: Turkey
weapons.description: Spheda putter. Good for short distances.

weapons.name: 7 Branch Sword
weapons.description: Dug up from ancient ruins. Holds a mysterious power.

weapons.name: 7th Heaven
weapons.description: Beautifully ornate sword. He who sees it is captivated.

weapons.name: Ama no Murakumo
weapons.description: A sword among swords. The strongest of all?

weapons.name: Antique Sword
weapons.description: Ancient sword forged long ago.

weapons.name: Atlamillia Sword
weapons.description: Sword with the power of an Atlamillia.

weapons.name: Baselard
weapons.description: Big single-edged sword with long reach.

weapons.name: Bastard Sword
weapons.description: Strong double-edged sword.

weapons.name: Big Bang
weapons.description: Star-powered sword.

weapons.name: Bone Rapier
weapons.description: Sword made of bone. Its abilities are unknown.

weapons.name: Brave Ark
weapons.description: Legendary sword. All but forgotten.

weapons.name: Broad Sword
weapons.description: Broad, double-edged sword. Good attack power but heavy.

weapons.name: Choora
weapons.description: Short sword with a beautifully-patterned blade.

weapons.name: Chopper
weapons.description: Short, easy-to-handle sword.

weapons.name: Chronicle 2
weapons.description: Manipulates time. Surpasses even the Chronicle Sword.

weapons.name: Chronicle Sword
weapons.description: Manipulates time. Found between time and space.

weapons.name: Claymore
weapons.description: Large, double edged-sword. Heavy but powerful.

weapons.name: Cliff Knife
weapons.description: Short sword with hidden magic powers.

weapons.name: Cross Heinder
weapons.description: A treasured, double-edged sword with tremendous power.

weapons.name: Dark Cloud
weapons.description: Magic sword with the power of darkness.

weapons.name: Dark Excalibur
weapons.description: Evil sword that presides over everlasting darkness.

weapons.name: Drain Seeker
weapons.description: Demon sword born of a magic spell. Drains enemy power.

weapons.name: Dusack
weapons.description: Wieldy, single-edged sword with a unique design. Sharp.

weapons.name: Evilcise
weapons.description: Sword imbued with the power of an evil spirit.

weapons.name: Garayan Sword
weapons.description: Probably contains the spirit of Mardan Garayan.

weapons.name: Gladius
weapons.description: Light, one-handed sword. Relatively high attack.

weapons.name: Griffon Fork
weapons.description: Made from the feathers of a legendary monster.

weapons.name: Halloween Blade
weapons.description: Cute sword with a Halloween pumpkin design.

weapons.name: Holy Daedalus Blade
weapons.description: The sword Monica's father, King Raybrandt, left her.

weapons.name: Island King
weapons.description: Once used by the great ancient king, Kamehameha.

weapons.name: Kitchen Knife
weapons.description: Get good with this and you could be a super chef.

weapons.name: Lamb's Sword
weapons.description: Lamb: As gentle as a lamb? Looks weak, but... Wolf: It looks thirsty for blood. It seems to have grown in power.

weapons.name: Long Sword
weapons.description: Monica's favorite. So-so attack, but easy to use.

weapons.name: Maneater
weapons.description: A sword that devours the souls of men.

weapons.name: Mardan Garayan
weapons.description: Definitely contains the spirit of Mardan Garayan.

weapons.name: Mardan Sword
weapons.description: Might contain the spirit of Mardan Garayan.

weapons.name: Muramasa
weapons.description: Famous sword crafted by great swordsmith Muramasa.

weapons.name: Royal Sword
weapons.description: Decorative sword with quite an edge.

weapons.name: Ruler's Sword
weapons.description: Sword once used by the legendary Aga.

weapons.name: Sand Breaker
weapons.description: Rare sword made from desert sand. Easily broken, though.

weapons.name: Sargatanas
weapons.description: Sword of darkness. Once owned by the god of death.

weapons.name: Sax
weapons.description: Single-edged sword that's easy to handle.

weapons.name: Serpent Slicer
weapons.description: A sword bathed crimson in the lifeblood of snakes.

weapons.name: Shamshir
weapons.description: Distinctive curved blade. Easy to handle.

weapons.name: Shining Bravado
weapons.description: Aborbs light and converts it into slashing power.

weapons.name: Small Sword
weapons.description: Small Japanese sword. Wieldy and devastatingly sharp.

weapons.name: Sun Sword
weapons.description: Darkness-slicing sword. Legendary.

weapons.name: Sword of Zeus
weapons.description: Sword of immeasurable power. Once used by the great god.

weapons.name: Tsukikage
weapons.description: A sword blessed by the power of moonlight.

weapons.name: Wise Owl Sword
weapons.description: Legendary sword made by the white-bearded owl's artisan.

weapons.name: Angel Shooter
weapons.description: Armband often worn by clergymen.

weapons.name: Athena's Armlet
weapons.description: Host to the blessed power of the goddess Athena.

weapons.name: Bandit Brassard
weapons.description: Lets you steal enemy's items in battle.

weapons.name: Crystal Brassard
weapons.description: Valuable armband made of rare crystal.

weapons.name: Destruction Brassard
weapons.description: Dark armband with the power to destroy all.

weapons.name: Five-Star Armlet
weapons.description: Made in the shape of the ancient royal house' crest.

weapons.name: Goddess Brassard
weapons.description: Armband blessed by a goddess.

weapons.name: Gold Brassard
weapons.description: A valuable brassard made of gold.

weapons.name: Love
weapons.description: Only those that truly understand love can wear it.

weapons.name: Magic Brassard
weapons.description: Magical armband.

weapons.name: Mobius Bangle
weapons.description: Absorbs power from infinite reaches of time and space.

weapons.name: Moon Armlet
weapons.description: Highly magical armlet made from the Moon Stone.

weapons.name: Platinum Brassard
weapons.description: Sturdy armband with strong magic.

weapons.name: Pocklekul
weapons.description: Magical armband made to honor the forest dwarves.

weapons.name: Satan Brassard
weapons.description: Armband said to have been forged by Satan.

weapons.name: Spirit Brassard
weapons.description: Phantom armband. Forged by spirits.

weapons.name: Star Armlet
weapons.description: Magical armlet that captures the stars' brightness.

weapons.name: Sun Armlet
weapons.description: Legendary armlet made of sunlight changed into metal.

weapons.name: Thorn Armlet
weapons.description: Armlet of woven thorns.
